description: Returns the optimization findings for an account. It returns the number of:

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account for which to return recommendation summaries. If your account is the management account of an organization, use this parameter to specify the member account for which you want to return recommendation summaries. Only one account ID can be specified per request. (string) ---

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of recommendation summaries to return with a single request. To retrieve the remaining results, make another request with the returned nextToken value.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to advance to the next page of recommendation summaries.

nested_items.name: recommendationSummaries
nested_items.description: An array of objects that summarize a recommendation.

nested_items.name: summaries
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe a recommendation summary.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The finding classification of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the recommendation summary.

nested_items.name: reasonCodeSummaries
nested_items.description: An array of objects that summarize a finding reason code.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the finding reason code.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the finding reason code summary.

nested_items.name: idleSummaries
nested_items.description: Describes the findings summary of the idle resources.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the finding group for the idle resources.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The count of idle resources in the finding group.

nested_items.name: recommendationResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type that the recommendation summary applies to.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the recommendation summary.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunity
nested_items.description: An object that describes the savings opportunity for a given resource type. Savings opportunity includes the estimated monthly savings amount and percentage.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible as a percentage of monthly cost by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the estimated monthly savings amount possible by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource. This is based on the On-Demand instance pricing..

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: idleSavingsOpportunity
nested_items.description: Describes the savings opportunity for recommendations of a given resource type or for the recommendation option of an individual resource.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible as a percentage of monthly cost by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the estimated monthly savings amount possible by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource. This is based on the On-Demand instance pricing..

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: aggregatedSavingsOpportunity
nested_items.description: Describes the savings opportunity for recommendations of a given resource type or for the recommendation option of an individual resource.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible as a percentage of monthly cost by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the estimated monthly savings amount possible by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource. This is based on the On-Demand instance pricing..

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: currentPerformanceRiskRatings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the performance risk ratings for a given resource type.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: A count of the applicable resource types with a high performance risk rating.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: A count of the applicable resource types with a medium performance risk rating.

nested_items.name: low
nested_items.description: A count of the applicable resource types with a low performance risk rating.

nested_items.name: veryLow
nested_items.description: A count of the applicable resource types with a very low performance risk rating.

nested_items.name: inferredWorkloadSavings
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describes the estimated monthly saving amounts for the instances running on the specified inferredWorkloadTypes. The array contains the top five savings opportunites for the instances that run inferred workload types.

nested_items.name: inferredWorkloadTypes
nested_items.description: The applications that might be running on the instance as inferred by Compute Optimizer.
AmazonEmr - Infers that Amazon EMR might be running on the instance.
ApacheCassandra - Infers that Apache Cassandra might be running on the instance.
ApacheHadoop - Infers that Apache Hadoop might be running on the instance.
Memcached - Infers that Memcached might be running on the instance.
NGINX - Infers that NGINX might be running on the instance.
PostgreSql - Infers that PostgreSQL might be running on the instance.
Redis - Infers that Redis might be running on the instance.
Kafka - Infers that Kafka might be running on the instance.
SQLServer - Infers that SQLServer might be running on the instance.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the estimated monthly savings amount possible by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource. This is based on the On-Demand instance pricing.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings.
